backdrop.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the scenery behind something that you are looking at
backdrop.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The sea made a splendid backdrop to the garden.
backdrop.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the conditions or situation in which something happens
backdrop.translation[0].definitions[1].e: a love story set against a backdrop of war and despair
